HOUSE.opening: I have heard strong rumours that

HOUSE.ending: . They are always behaving strangely; as if they have something to hide

HOUSE.opening: Woah, don't get too excited but just between me and you

COMMENT.mean: I'm not sure what to make of that Ashley person, I'm not even certain of their gender
COMMENT.nice: Hmmm Ashley you say, I would trust that person with my life

COMMENT.mean: Ha, dont listen to Billy, he's an old fool with no depth perception
COMMENT.nice: Billy's a trustworthy guy, always has his eye on the big picture

COMMENT.mean: Who does that Brian guy think he is, some kind of ninja?
COMMENT.nice: I've heard Brian is a great guy but I've never been able to find him

COMMENT.mean: Get this right, I saw Dave trip over his own beard one time, it was hilarious
COMMENT.nice: Dave is one of the most honest fellows I have ever had the pleasure to meet.

COMMENT.mean: You know that guy Dennis, I wouldn't trust him as far as he can throw me
COMMENT.nice: Dennis wears the mystical shorts of truth.

COMMENT.mean: Just between you and me, I think Dianna might not be as she appears
COMMENT.nice: Diana is basically my hero.

COMMENT.mean: Geoff dresses like a band leader, he's not even in a band, whats up with that
COMMENT.nice: Geoff is like totally the must trustworthy guy in the village.

COMMENT.mean: Jennifer or Jenny as she is known by some is not a very nice woman.
COMMENT.nice: Jeniffer and I are like besties.

COMMENT.mean: I have been jilted far to many times by Jessica to find her trustworthy in any way
COMMENT.nice: Have you met Jessica? She is like Wowza, I mean, well exactly what I said really... Wowza

COMMENT.mean: I don't really get Katie to be honest. I mean, who is she trying to fool?
COMMENT.nice: Katie is a lovely girl really, everybody says so.

COMMENT.mean: I find Kerry is very suspicious, don't ask me why
COMMENT.nice: Kerry is a very wise lady, you'd best pay attention to what she says.

COMMENT.mean: What is up with that jumpsuit that mort wears, makes him look like a super villain
COMMENT.nice: Mort is a genius, don't underestimate him.

COMMENT.mean: Some say Pat is a DOCTOR, WHOever says that is deluded in my book
COMMENT.nice: Pat has always got time to help out his fellow man.

COMMENT.mean: What is up with that jumpsuit that mort wears, makes him look like a super villain
COMMENT.nice: Mort is a genius, don't underestimate him.

COMMENT.mean: Rich by name, rich by reputation. However he is a complete liar with no sense of style.
COMMENT.nice: Rich has like so much money he doesnt even need to lie about anything.

COMMENT.mean: You know why scoot is called scooter? I'ts because his parents hated him and so should you
COMMENT.nice: Scooter is a smart guy, I mean look at those glasses, you dont get glasses like that if you can't read.

COMMENT.mean: I dont think I even need to tell you why Shmebulock isn't trustworthy
COMMENT.nice: Shmebulock is my homeslice.

COMMENT.mean: Susan may look innocent, but let me ask you this, If you wanted to appear innocent what better way than to dress as a nun
COMMENT.nice: Susan is a lovely lady with a kind heart.

COMMENT.mean: You can't trust Tifa, I think she even stole her name from a popular RPG from the nineties
COMMENT.nice: Tifa is pretty cool, one of my favourite characters.

COMMENT.mean: Well I've never trusted any man named Tom and I'm not going to start now, plus I think he might be a troll of some kind
COMMENT.nice: I always trust men named Tom, I'm not really sure why.

RANDOM.comment: Well you might be wondering what a guy like me is doing dressed as Austin Powers, well I ask you this. Why aren't you dressed as Austin Powers?
I don't know if you know this about me but I'm like an eating contest champion, I have the T-shirts to prove it
Well, well, well, what do we have here, you must be new around thse parts
